name: Netflix Stock Price vs Subscriber Growth Correlation
question: How correlated has NFLX stock performance been with subscriber growth announcements over time?
retailQuestion: Does Netflix stock go up when they add more subscribers?
description: Analyzes the correlation between Netflix stock performance and quarterly subscriber growth announcements over 8 years. Examines stock reactions to subscriber beats/misses and tests whether subscriber metrics can predict stock movements in the streaming industry.

workflow.description: Step 1: Get 8+ years of NFLX daily price data around earnings dates
Step 2: Get current NFLX market data for latest context
Step 3: Analyze earnings reactions and subscriber guidance impact
Step 4: Calculate predictive value of subscriber metrics for stock returns
Step 5: Evaluate correlation strength and investment implications
